name: Cold Front (chrismcco)
description:
Description

Keep ‘Felix the Snowman’ from melting in this ‘Triple Triad’ inspired card game.

Created for Ludum Dare 46.

How To Win

Have more Cold Cards connected to ‘Felix the Snowman’ than Hot Cards. A card is connected to him if it is either in one of the slots next to him, or connected to a line of cards of the same type (Hot / Cold) where at least one is adjacent to him.

How To Play
  1. At the start of the game you draw 4 random Cold Cards.
  2. Drag and drop your Cold Cards around the snowman.
  3. Card types can be flipped if an opposite card type is placed beside them and has a higher number in their direction.
  4. Continue placing cards until the board is full.
  5. The side with the most connected cards wins.
